title: Tildagon App Showcase
description: The badges at EMF are programmable, and I created a small app to let you play simon says on the badge.

title: TreeHacks
description: The SpyLingo project lets you practice a foreign language by trying to extract target information from them.

title: Hack for Impact
description: This charity project was a financial classification model which took in data about a user's expenses and created tags to help classify them.

title: AI Capture the Flag
description: AI Capture the Flag is a competiton to complete various challenges in the field of data science and machine learning. I only managed to complete 8 of the 27 flags, but it was still a fun experience.

title: StevensHacks
description: A simple platform fighter inspired by Smash Bros. that includes 4 fighters, including the school mascot.

title: MadHacks
description: This application tracks the face of the user through their webcam in real time, then uses the position of the mouth to animate a cartoon mouth. The idea was to help animators create more realistic lip syncing animations.
